markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fleeting Shadow](/Feats.aspx?ID=2050) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 188 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=73)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2047)

</column>

---

You're able to quickly disappear and then move about stealthily. You [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62), then [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) twice.
name: Fleeting Shadow
